reference.shortdesc: The prophead element supports user-defined headings for the properties element.

section.p: By default, the processing for the properties element produces standard headings of Type,Value, and Description. The prophead element allows you to create custom headings as needed by special cases.

section.title: Examples
section.p: A properties section with a custom property heading looks like the following:<properties> <prophead> <proptypehd>Datatype</proptypehd> <propvaluehd>Recommended Value</propvaluehd> <propdeschd>Meaning</propdeschd> </prophead> <property> <proptype>integer</proptype> <propvalue>42</propvalue> <propdesc>The answer to all the questions in the universe.</propdesc> </property> <property> <proptype>keyword</proptype> <propvalue>default, rect, circle, poly</propvalue> <propdesc>The values allowed for an image map shape.</propdesc> </property> </properties>
